org.rdkit.knime.util

Class SettingsModelEnumerationArray<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • SettingsModel
      • org.rdkit.knime.util.SettingsModelEnumerationArray<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - An arbitrary Enumeration.

    public class SettingsModelEnumerationArray<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
extends SettingsModel
    This class stores a setting with an array of enumeration values.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze

    • Constructor Detail

      • SettingsModelEnumerationArray

        public SettingsModelEnumerationArray(java.lang.Class<T> enumType,
                                     java.lang.String configName,
                                     T[] arrDefaultValues)
        Creates a new object holding a list of enumeration values. The current value will be set to the specified default value list.
        Parameters:
        enumType - Enumeration class this setting is based on. Must not be null.
        configName - The identifier the value is stored with in the org.knime.core.node.NodeSettings object. Must not be null.
        arrDefaultValues - The initial value. Must not be null.

      • setValuesAsString

        public void setValuesAsString(java.lang.String[] newValuesAsString)
        Set the values stored to the new values represented as strings. These strings must match enumeration names or toString() values of the registered enumeration class. If not, the default values will be used instead for ALL values and a warning will be logged.
        Parameters:
        newValuesAsString - The new values to store.
        See Also:
        #setValue(Enum)

      • getValues

        public T[] getValues()
        Returns the current enumeration value of this setting model.
        Returns:
        The current value stored. Never null.

      • getValuesAsString

        public java.lang.String[] getValuesAsString()
        Returns:
        the current value stored.

      • addFlowValuePlaceholders

        protected java.lang.String[] addFlowValuePlaceholders(java.lang.String[] arrValuesAsString)
        Fills up the array (null is treated like an empty array) with flow value placeholder values, if they are not existing yet in the array. The returned array will contain not more elements in total as the total number of flow variable placeholders of the enumeration. This means, if there are 2 "real" elements already and 5 placeholders exist, this method will only add 3 placeholders.
        Parameters:
        arrValuesAsString - Existing value array. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Array with all placeholders added, which were not in the array yet. Never null, but maybe empty (if there are no placeholders in the enumeration).

      • removeFlowValuePlaceholders

        protected java.lang.String[] removeFlowValuePlaceholders(java.lang.String[] arrValuesAsString)
        Removes all flow value placeholder values from the array (null is treated like an empty array).
        Parameters:
        arrValuesAsString - Existing value array (potentially with placeholder values). Can be null.
        Returns:
        Array with all placeholders removed. Returns null, if null was passed in. Returns an empty array, if all values were placeholders before.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()

      • isFlowVariablePlaceholder

        public boolean isFlowVariablePlaceholder(T item)
        Determines, if the passed in enumeration item is shall be treated as flow variable placeholder. This is the case, if it's name starts with "FlowVariablePlaceHolder".
        Parameters:
        item - Enumeration item. Can be null.
        Returns:
        True, if the specified item is considered one of the FlowVariablePlaceHolderXXX enumeration constants. False, if null was passed in or if it is not such a constant.

      • findFlowVariablePlaceholders

        public java.util.List<T> findFlowVariablePlaceholders()
        Traverses all enumeration values of the specified enum type and filters out and returns all constants that start with "FlowVariablePlaceHolder".
        Parameters:
        enumType - Enumeration type.
        Returns:
        List of all FlowVariablePlaceHolderXXX enumeration constants.
